Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I don't know if this has already been discussed.

I'm playing on a 0.25 modded installation of KSP and I'm wondering if there's any contract about redirecting an asteroid. I'm not using FinePrint. 

I couldn't find any precise info about this, so I'm asking you guys. 

Thank you in advance

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-08T22:06:42Z" title="03/08/2015 10:06  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 8, 2015</time> by Agost**

No, 0.25 did not include asteroid contracts.

You should upgrade to 0.90.

> 
> No, 0.25 did not include asteroid contracts.
> You should upgrade to 0.90.

Thank you

I'm continuing a modded career just to get more confident with the game. I'll upgrade to 1.0 when Squad releases it.
